document_data.caption: A map showing Darkhope's Road near the Lake of Steam.
document_data.name: Darkhope's Road
document_data.mainbody: '''Darkhope's Road''', formerly known as '''Peakskirt Trail''', was a trail found in eastern [[Tethyr]] and the [[Lake of Steam]] region of [[south Faerûn]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}<ref name=EotSS.M"> It was rarely ever featured on [[map]]s made by northerners.
document_data.Description: Darkhope's Road was paved and narrower than the more prominent [[Golden Road]].
document_data.Geography: The trail originated in [[Kzelter]]. It stretched southeast for approximately {{SI|150|mi|k|long=yes}} before meeting the [[Tyrant's Road]] at the crossing at the [[River Mintar]].<ref name=EotSS.M"/>
document_data.Notable Locations: [[Mintar]] was found along Darkhope's Road where the River Mintar emptied into the Lake of Steam. The [[Narrows Trail]] branched south from Darkhope's Road northwest of Mintar.<ref name=EotSS.M"/>
